resources: Wamboo Video is the type of data that we consume the most and the most complicated to process in electronic devices, leading to tons of CO2 emissions every year. By using Wamboo, you can reduce the size of your videos up to 90%, to save memory not only in your phone, but also in the social media servers (big PCs that store our digital information) if you share them. This way, with smaller videos, you will reduce your carbon footprint. In addition, Wamboo is efficient because it minimizes the battery usage of the phone while compressing the videos and it shows the associated pollution when some battery is wasted. In traditional compression methods the phone’s resources are not used efficiently and the battery usage is maximized leading to pollution as the phone needs to be charged more often, consuming more electrical energy (with the associated costs of electricity for the users). This way, you\'ll also save money in storage (hard drives, the Cloud ...) and in electricity! If you\'re looking for a sustainable way to capture precious moments with photos and videos while taking care of our planet, Wamboo Cam is the solution you need! Wamboo Cam is much more than a conventional camera; it\'s your eco-friendly companion in the world of cinematography. Download the eco-camera, Wamboo Cam, completely free here. We encourage you and everyone who use video to compress them using Wamboo before sharing them, specially if you think your video can be shared multiple times or go viral: we will avoid tons of CO2 emissions a year! Comments or questions? What features would you like to see in the next version of Wamboo? Contact us: contact.harmonyvalley@gmail.com Select Video Ultrafast Good Best but slow Custom (high quality: slower+less compression) Custom (low quality: faster+smaller) "Fastest and smallest video, loosing some quality" "Best quality vs. compression speed and size reduction" "Best size reduction and quality but it's the slowest" Compress Video Share Compressed Video None Initial size = Compressed size = Conversion time = Initial battery = Remaining battery = Associated pollution = Quality loss = Bad quality or not possible to obtain; change compression parameters Size reduction = Video Compression Compression in progress… Compression successfully completed.
